name: The Lady Mascott - Bleeding Heart
description:
Bleeding heart.

This piece is your negative thoughts.
This piece is your tears.
This piece is your crying heart.
This piece is your wound, or your broken smile.

When you torned.
When you fall.
When you feel no other lights.

Piece that represent my numb emotions when i was hospitalized 
and journey for a slow recovery monthes.

I hope this piece can be represent your struggles too.
I wish the best may come upon you and days passed get better.
